directions: Melt cocoa and butter or margarine over low heat. Transfer to mixing bowl, cream together. Add sugar gradually. Blend in eggs one at a time.
Sift together flour, baking powder and salt. Stir into chocolate mixture.  Mix in nuts.  Spread batter into a greased 8 inch square pan.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 20 - 25 minutes.
title: Katrina's Best-Ever Chocolate Brownies
